{{title|iter_swap{{small|(ranges::chunk_view::''inner-iterator'')}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/chunk_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|
friend constexpr void iter_swap( const /*inner-iterator*/&amp; x,
                                 const /*inner-iterator*/&amp; y )
    noexcept(noexcept(ranges::iter_swap(*x.parent_-&gt;current_,
                                        *y.parent_-&gt;current_)))
    requires std::indirectly_swappable&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;&gt;;
}}

Applies {{lc|ranges::iter_swap}} to the underlying cached iterators.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} be the underlying pointer to the enclosing {{tt|chunk_view}}, and {{c|*i.parent_-&gt;current_}} denote the underlying cached iterator of type {{c|ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;}}.

Equivalent to: {{c|ranges::iter_swap(*x.parent_-&gt;current_, *y.parent_-&gt;current_);}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|chunk_view::''inner-iterator''}}}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x, y|iterators to the elements to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
